channel.title: My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Implementing Memory networks in Tensorflow
item.description: We will implement the End to End memory networks paper. We shall use Dom Lun’s reader functions and concentrate on getting the simplest implementation of the network. In this process we will learn how to manipulate the memories to get the output. We shall use Tensorflow 1.0.1 for this code and loosely use the code structure from Hafner’s blog. This blog assumes a basic understanding of Tensorflow and intermediate understanding of Python 2 or Python 3
